entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Snow beginning early in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023
